labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: you see **both** mute and what you selected earlier. e.g mute and all or mute and mentions only
data.expected_result: when you scroll down to the channel name, you should see the channel name and then 'mute' since it's the most recent setting you applied.
data.short_description: Setting a notification for a channel then muting it will not change the notification settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the server name - Click notification settings - Go to notification overrides and  select a channel - Turn the notification to "mentions only" or something, as long as it's not "mute" - exit out of notification settings then right click on the channel you just selected - click mute - click on the channel name and go back to notification settings
